data.name: War for the Overworld - Jack O'Worker Skin
data.detailed_description:
The citizens of Kairos celebrate Halloween by donning costumes and consuming confectionery. But the best your poor workers can hope for is a new haircut.

Shame then that you do not have a steady scissor hand, eh, Underlord? You’ve only gone and maimed one of them so severely that to conceal his disfigurement, he must now wear a jack-o’-lantern!... Say hello to your Jack O’Worker!

Unleash the Jack O’Worker skin in all non-Campaign game modes!

Happy Halloween, Underlord!
data.about_the_game:
The citizens of Kairos celebrate Halloween by donning costumes and consuming confectionery. But the best your poor workers can hope for is a new haircut.

Shame then that you do not have a steady scissor hand, eh, Underlord? You’ve only gone and maimed one of them so severely that to conceal his disfigurement, he must now wear a jack-o’-lantern!... Say hello to your Jack O’Worker!

Unleash the Jack O’Worker skin in all non-Campaign game modes!

Happy Halloween, Underlord!
data.short_description: Maimed by your wayward scissor hand during a haircut for Halloween 2015, the loyal Jack O’Worker conceals his disfigured face behind a jack-o’-lantern.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8 , Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT400 series with 512MB RAM or better, ATI 4870HD with 512MB RAM or better
  • Hard Drive: 7 GB available space (may increase in the future)
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT500 series with 1GB RAM or better, ATI 5870HD with 1GB RAM or better
  • Hard Drive: 10 GB available space (may increase in the future)
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
